name: Sobada Kothala Himbutu
description: Kothala Himbutu (Salacia) is a herb that is native to India and Sri Lanka. The root and stem are used to make medicine. Kothala Himbutu (Salacia) is used as a treatment for diabetes, asthma, joint pain, weight loss, and other conditions. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
